entities.name: ROSETTA STONE
entities.description: A significant artifact discovered in 1799 by French soldiers during Napoleon's campaign in Egypt, containing a decree issued by King Ptolemy V in 196 BC, written in three scripts: ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs, Demotic script, and Greek

entities.name: NAPOLEON
entities.description: French military and political leader who led a campaign in Egypt where the Rosetta Stone was discovered

entities.name: EGYPT
entities.description: Country where the Rosetta Stone was discovered and the civilization that created the hieroglyphic script

entities.name: KING PTOLEMY V
entities.description: Ancient Egyptian ruler who issued the decree inscribed on the Rosetta Stone in 196 BC

entities.name: JEAN-FRANÇOIS CHAMPOLLION
entities.description: French scholar who successfully deciphered the hieroglyphic text on the Rosetta Stone in 1822

entities.name: DECRETE OF KING PTOLEMY V
entities.description: The decree issued by King Ptolemy V in 196 BC, which is inscribed on the Rosetta Stone in three scripts

entities.name: DECRYPTION OF HIEROGLYPHS
entities.description: The process and achievement of deciphering ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs, primarily through the work of Jean-François Champollion in 1822

entities.name: ANCIENT EGYPTIAN CIVILIZATION
entities.description: The civilization that created the hieroglyphic script and the Rosetta Stone

entities.name: GREEK SCRIPT
entities.description: One of the three scripts used on the Rosetta Stone, which was already known and understood, aiding in the decipherment of hieroglyphs

entities.name: DEMOSTIC SCRIPT
entities.description: One of the three scripts used on the Rosetta Stone, alongside hieroglyphs and Greek

entities.name: EGYPTOLOGY
entities.description: The field of study that focuses on the history, language, and culture of ancient Egypt

entities.name: ARCHAEOLOGY
entities.description: The scientific study of human history and prehistory through the excavation of sites and the analysis of artifacts and other physical remains

entities.name: LINGUISTICS
entities.description: The scientific study of language and its structure, including the study of ancient scripts and languages

entities.name: CUNEIFORM
entities.description: An ancient writing system used in Mesopotamia, inspired by the methods used to decipher the Rosetta Stone

entities.name: LINEAR B
entities.description: An ancient script used in Mycenaean Greece, deciphered using methods inspired by the Rosetta Stone

entities.name: MAYAN HIEROGLYPHS
entities.description: An ancient writing system used by the Maya civilization, deciphered using methods inspired by the Rosetta Stone
